title: Recycling Bins
description: An image showing four recycling bins in different colors: blue, green, yellow, and red. Each bin contains various types of recyclable materials such as paper, aluminum cans, glass bottles, and plastic containers. The bins are designed with the recycling symbol on them, promoting proper waste segregation.

title: Construction Site Illustration
description: An illustration depicting a construction site with various heavy machinery. At the top, there is a tree and a yellow excavator. Below, a truck is positioned on a slope, while a yellow bulldozer and an excavator are working on the ground. A dump truck is shown carrying a load of dirt or materials.

title: Digital Thermometer
description: A digital thermometer with a blue casing and a clear display showing temperature readings. The thermometer is designed for measuring body temperature.

title: Compact Car
description: A small, two-door car with a vibrant red body and a green roof and accents. The car has a rounded shape and is designed for urban driving, emphasizing compactness and efficiency.

title: Open-Pit Mine
description: A vast open-pit mine showcasing multiple layers of excavated earth and rock. The mine features winding roads that lead through the terraced layers, with visible machinery and equipment scattered throughout the site. The colors of the earth range from dark browns to lighter shades, indicating different materials being extracted.

title: Excavation Scene
description: An illustration depicting a yellow bulldozer on a grassy hill, actively digging into the earth. The hill slopes downwards, revealing a section of dark soil being excavated. A tree is visible on the left side of the image, adding to the natural landscape.
